Traits.Name: Operational Authority
Traits.Content: The Manager can issue commands that grant allies within 30 feet a bonus of +1 to their attack rolls and saving throws.

Traits.Name: Crisis Management
Traits.Content: The Manager has advantage on saving throws against being frightened, reflecting their ability to maintain composure in high-stress situations.

Actions.Name: Directive Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage as the Manager's authoritative presence overwhelms the target.

Actions.Name: Containment Breach (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Manager initiates a burst of chaotic energy in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one, as the sudden influx of intrusive thoughts and fears assails their mind.

Actions.Name: Purge Protocol
Actions.Content: The Manager can target one creature they can see within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of their next turn, as the Manager activates a harmful countermeasure designed to neutralize threats. On a failed save, the target also takes 15 (3d8 + 1) acid damage as corrosive mist envelops them.
